findings.title: Python scripts present but Python tool not in allowed-tools
findings.description: Skill restricts tools to ['Bash', 'Read', 'Write', 'Edit', 'Glob', 'Grep'] but includes Python scripts
findings.remediation: Add 'Python' to allowed-tools or remove Python scripts

findings.title: TOOL CHAINING ABUSE detected by YARA
findings.description: Detects suspicious tool chaining patterns that could lead to data exfiltration: get source-grounded insights, risk assessments, and actionable recommendations. Upload
findings.snippet: Analyze your local documents with Google NotebookLM's AI to get source-grounded insights, risk assessments, and actionable recommendations. Upload your files once, then query them repeatedly for different perspectives.
findings.remediation: Review and remove tool chaining abuse pattern
